metadata.synopsis: Dialog for the child customer in the Fireworks House.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the child on the ground floor of the Fireworks House in CTY_Main_A near coords: 2, 16, -127

0.speaker: Willow
0.text: That smokepowder smell - it smells so good.

1.speaker: Willow
1.text: When I've got my own money, I'm going to buy so many fireworks.
